General.Name: Living Cell Technologies
General.Description: Living Cell Technologies Limited, a biotechnology company, discovers, develops, and commercializes regenerative treatments that use naturally occurring cells to restore functions in Australia and New Zealand. It is developing NTCELL, an alginate-coated capsule, which is in phase IIb clinical trial for the treatment of Parkinson's disease. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Melbourne, Australia.
